name: 2D Combat Platformer - Technical Demo
description:
Controls

  • A - D --> Movement
  • J --> Melee attack
  • K --> Teleport (use WASD to direct it)
  • L --> Fireball

2D Platformer demo maded with Unity.

Check the code or clone the project here: https://github.com/MateoRyhr/combat-platformer-2d

Assets used:

Characters:

https://luizmelo.itch.io/wizard-pack

https://luizmelo.itch.io/medieval-warrior-pack

Map:

https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-platformer-castle

https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-platformer-village-props

SFX:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-deadly-kombat-228835

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/weapons/demo-ancient-

magic-...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/flight-magic-sfx-32895

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/ambience-banaue-rice-...

Music:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/fantasy-music-lite-...

VFX:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-free-109...

Thanks to all the artists that upload all those assets!
